General.Name: Terra Santa Propriedades Agrícolas S.A.
General.Description: Terra Santa Propriedades Agrícolas S.A. operates as a rural real estate company. The company engages in leasing of farms for agricultural production. It has seven farms located in various municipalities in Mato Grosso. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Praça General Gentil Falcão, 108, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04571-150
